text: Do the Right Thing is a 1989 American comedy-drama movie that is notable for the movie debuts for Rosie Perez and Martin Lawrence. Spike Lee directed, wrote and played as Mookie in this movie, which is set in Brooklyn, New York City. The subjects in Do the Right Thing involve racial troubles and hot weather around New York City. Other actors in the movie were Samuel L. Jackson.
